I have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.

content.text: Hi, I'm Superman. I'm a huge fan of horse racing.
That's great! I'm a professional horse racing handicapper.
No way! That's so cool!
Thanks! I've been doing it for a few years now.
What's your favorite part of the job?
I love the thrill of the race and the challenge of trying to pick the right horse.
That makes sense. I can imagine it being really exciting.
It can be! And it's also a lot of fun to learn about the horses and the trainers and the owners.
I'm sure it is. I've always been interested in horse racing, but I don't know much about it.
Well, you're in luck! I'm always happy to talk about it.
That's great! I'd love to learn more.
Sure, what would you like to know?
Well, for starters, how do you handicap a horse?
There are a lot of different factors that go into handicapping a horse, but the most important ones are the horse's past performance, the trainer's record, and the track conditions.
That makes sense. I can imagine that it takes a lot of experience to be a good handicapper.
It definitely does. It takes a lot of time and study to learn how to analyze all of the different factors involved in a horse race.
I can imagine. Well, it sounds like you're really good at it.
Thanks! I'm always learning new things, but I'm happy with where I'm at right now.
That's great! I'm sure you'll keep getting better and better.
Thanks! I hope so.
Well, I'm really glad I met you. You've been really informative.
Thanks! I'm glad I could help.
Maybe we can talk more about horse racing sometime.
Sure, I'd love that.
